name: Back Scratching Simulator 2023
description:
A very serious local coop game about scratching somebody's back. Play the first game here (single-player).

Made during #ALTCTRL by a developer who has occasionally scratched a back. With music by Insidebeat.

Notes:

  • This game requires you to hold your keyboard on your back. If you're using a laptop you'll need to plug in an external keyboard.
  • This is a coop game, you will need two people to play. If you're looking for a single-player game, try the first one. In this game, one player isn't allowed to see the screen, use props if necessary to restrict their vision.
  • Some keyboards don't work properly with certain combinations of 3 or more keys (but the game doesn't really require them, that's only useful for cheating).
  • Button mashing is for cheaters. Plus you could press a key that closes the game.
  • The game supports QWERTY, QWERTZ, and AZERTY keyboard layouts. You can switch them from the menu (press escape during the tutorial to go to the menu).
